metadata.title: CVE-2019-25072 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Due to support of Gzip compression in request bodies, as well as a lack oflimiting response body sizes, a malicious server can cause a client toconsume a significant amount of system resources, which may be used as adenial of service vector.

criterions.comment: tendermint: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
